MESTRADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: Peripheral districts response to circulation conditions in a model of the arterial tree
MESTRADO.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-ORIENTADOR: Giuseppe Baselli; Maria Laura Costantino; Ettore Lanzarone

DOUTORADO.TITULO-DA-DISSERTACAO-TESE: Interactions between systemic and peripheral circulation: models and analysis
DOUTORADO.NOME-COMPLETO-DO-ORIENTADOR: Giuseppe Baselli; Ramakrishna Mukkamala; Sergio Cerutti

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES:
Visiting scholar with the ?Physiologic Signal Processing & Modeling Laboratory?, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, U.S.A.. Supervisor: Dr. Ramakrishna Mukkamala. Research topics: mathematical modeling of interactions between arterial blood pressure, cardiac output and total peripheral resistance beat-by-beat variability in conscious dogs.
Visits: October 2007 - February 2008; September 2008 - December 2008; October 2009 - March 2010; November 2011 - December 2011
